subject: Attention Beneficiary;
body:
Attention Beneficiary;
We hereby wish to inform you that your overdue funds have been sent to
this office/department with transfer approval number
UK-924/EU-001/23/LE for transfer/delivery to identify you as
beneficiary. Following the World Bank, United Nations (UN) and
European Union (EU) International Monetary Fund (IMF) meeting in
London. Mr Andrew  Bailey has been appointed responsible for this
transfer process.
It is therefore recommended to submit your full details for
verification and reopen your payment file for immediate
payment/transfer of your money within the next 48 hours. Please send
your contact details to their contact person as follows:
Name: Mr;Andrew  Bailey
Position: Director of Payments, Transfer Department
Personal email: 
mheimbach39@yahoo.com
Office  Email ; 
transdeprtb@mail2europe.com
Contact him immediately.
Sincerely,
Christine Madeleine O Lagarde
President of the European Central Bank

subject: Re: Attention Beneficiary;
body:
Hello Christine Madeleine Lagarde,

Thank you for your message. It's quite interesting to hear about this overdue fund transfer. I'm curious, could you please provide more details about this process? How was my name selected for this?

Also, I would like to know more about Mr. Andrew Bailey's role in this transfer process. What exactly will he be doing?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Sherri
